Feeling this was getting too intimate, AzureBlade broke the spark
contact and came out of his trance.

AzureBlade: Forgive me. I haven't explained everything. I am known as
Protoform Z, but my name is AzureBlade. I can feel things through my
spark, things like other sparks. I felt you were wounded, so I came to
offer my help. If you do not wish it, I will go. As for him... (He
pointed at Scourge) I have never seen him and I do not know him.

He rose from the ground and walked toward Scourge.

AzureBlade: Easy now! Relax and try to focus on your internal repairs.
You're wounded too. (Turning to Maxima) Would this happen to be some
kind of haven for the injured?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Her crimson optics went from Azureblade to Scourge. 
> 
> Remaining straight faced & unmoving. then cocking a 'brow'. Save
her? Was 
> every Male bot simply attracted to her & acting foolish?! 
> 
> Then turned her attention again to Azureblade, "What is it that you
want of 
> me." Glancing at Scourge, "Or are you like this one," indicating to
Scourge," 
> here to supposedly rescue me?" 
> 
> A faint image she remembered of a dragon... a kiss.... her sparked
warmed at 
> the thought... a face, though blurry & cloudy was seen. One from a
long ago 
> time.
